deleteassociateddevice.description: Grants permission to disassociate Device from a Device Instance

deletedeviceconfigurationtemplate.description: Grants permission to delete a Device Configuration Template

deletedeviceinstance.name: DeleteDeviceInstance
deletedeviceinstance.description: Grants permission to delete a Device Instance

deletesite.description: Grants permission to delete a Site

deleteuser.name: DeleteUser
deleteuser.description: Grants permission to delete a User

getdeviceconfigurationtemplate.description: Grants permission to view a Device Configuration Template

getdeviceinstance.name: GetDeviceInstance
getdeviceinstance.description: Grants permission to view a Device Instance

getsiteaddress.description: Grants permission to view address of a Site

listdeviceconfigurationtemplates.description: Grants permission to retrieve list of Device Configuration Templates

listdeviceinstances.name: ListDeviceInstances
listdeviceinstances.description: Grants permission to retrieve list of Device Instances

listsites.name: ListSites
listsites.description: Grants permission to view list of Sites

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource

listusers.name: ListUsers
listusers.description: Grants permission to view list of Users

rebootdevice.name: RebootDevice
rebootdevice.description: Grants permission to reboot Device associated with a Device Instance

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to an Amazon One Enterprise resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an Amazon One Enterprise resource
